page.title: 06REDMARLEYWOMANS FELLOWSHIP
page.content: In 1950 a group called Young Wives was formed but no one manted to leave Young Wives to go onto Mothers Union.So in 1965 they changed the name to Womans Fellowship.To start with the monthly meeting was held in homes but it grew so they moved it into the village hall.Each meeting is opened with a prayer and hymn followed by a speaker who would talk about many subjects like lapidary,cooking and egg painting.They keep connections with the church by helping at the Christmas Fete.If anyone is ill a member of Womans Fellowship will go and help to the best oftheir ability.Every November they have a party and in December they go carol singing.Until lately all the money raised would go to the Eastnor Childrens Home.Now the money goes to lots of different charities.
